sentences.en: An emissary was sent to France to establish diplomatic relations.
sentences.cn: 一位使者被送到法国去建立外交关系.

sentences.en: Build 3 rd Refinery on your Expansion Field and sell the Emissary.
sentences.cn: 在分矿区建造第三精炼厂然后买掉勘探车.

sentences.en: Deploy Emissary near your Expansion Field and wait for it to deploy.
sentences.cn: 将勘探车放在你的分矿区并且等待他部署.

sentences.en: How do they illustrate the service of a prophet as a covenant emissary?
sentences.cn: 怎样表明了先知的事工正象盟约使者一样?

sentences.en: I am the emissary to the ruler of all the world.
sentences.cn: 我是这个世界统治者的使者.

sentences.en: Is a mere emissary such as you worthy of Klara?
sentences.cn: 像你这样的使者陪得上克拉拉么?

sentences.en: Japan is sending two emissaries to Washington to discuss trade issues.
sentences.cn: 日本将派两位特使去华盛顿商讨贸易问题。

sentences.en: King Terenas sends an emissary ordering Arthas back home. Arthas burns the fleet.
sentences.cn: 国王泰瑞纳斯送出特使命令阿尔萨斯回家. 阿尔萨斯烧毁战舰.

sentences.en: Mr. Miller was sent as an emissary for the peace talks.
sentences.cn: 米勒先生被作为特使派遣去参加和平谈判。

sentences.en: My young emissary of the Poor People's League decided to deposit me here.
sentences.cn: 我的那位贫民会的年转向导,决定把我安顿在这里.

sentences.en: Que Emissary and set rally to your nearest Expansion Field.
sentences.cn: 制造勘探车并且将集合点设在最近的分矿区.

sentences.en: Silver briefly agreed; and this emissary retired again, leaving us together in the dark.
sentences.cn: 希尔弗立刻就同意了, 于是这个使者又退了出去, 将我们俩留在黑暗中.

sentences.en: The joy of family emissary, personal happiness partners, all of the happy baby.
sentences.cn: 家庭的欢乐使者, 个人的快乐伴侣, 所有人的开心宝贝.

sentences.en: Was Colombo the emissary of Pope Paul, his Trojan horse within the Commission?
sentences.cn: 科隆博是教皇保罗的特使吗？是他在委员会内部设下的卧底吗？

sentences.en: Yet another Italian emissary, General Zanossi, appeared on August 26 in Lisbon.
sentences.cn: 还有一名意大利特使, 扎努西将军,于8月26日出现在里斯本.

trans.tran_en: someone who is sent with an official message or to do official work
